maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.orig: Lea, what is wrong with you!?
maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.text: Лея, что с тобой не так!?

maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.orig:
Why have you been 
away for so long?

Just why can't you 
explain yourself properly?!
maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.text:
Почему ты не можешь 
просто взять и объясниться?!

maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.orig:
Lea... Don't feel 
bad about it.

The fact that you can't talk
is part of who you are.
maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.text:
Тот факт, что ты не можешь говорить, 
является частью того, кто ты есть.

maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.orig:
And it doesn't make 
you a bad person.
maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.text:
И это не делает 
тебя плохим человеком.

maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.orig:
To the contrary, 
it makes you special.

Because few can 
listen like you do.
maps/dreams/dream12.json/entities/661/se.text:
Потому что мало кто 
может слушать, как ты.
